thread.title: Rory McIlroy Responds to Criticism for Golfing With Trump: Calling Me a Fascist Is ‘Ridiculous’
thread.title_full: Rory McIlroy Responds to Criticism for Golfing With Trump: Calling Me a Fascist Is ‘Ridiculous’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Rory McIlroy Responds to Criticism for Golfing With Trump: Calling Me a Fascist Is ‘Ridiculous’
text:
McIlroy got some criticism over it, such as this tweet from Paul Krugman : This kind of shunning is actually important: A dishonest, authoritarian president must not be normalized https://t.co/SpF2B2gY8s 
— Paul Krugman (@paulkrugman) February 25, 2017 
That was in response to the following statement McIlroy posted defending himself and calling it “ridiculous” that he’s being called a fascist or bigot over a golf game with the president: 
— Rory McIlroy (@McIlroyRory) February 24, 2017 
[ image via David W. Leindecker/Shutterstock ] 
—— 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
